R

ReportBuilder - Class in pl.lib.api
Fluent builder that programmatically constructs a JasperReports design (JasperDesign) and compiles it into a JasperReport.
ReportBuilder() - Constructor for class pl.lib.api.ReportBuilder
Creates a builder with a random report name.
ReportBuilder(String) - Constructor for class pl.lib.api.ReportBuilder
Creates a builder with the provided report name.
reportCalculation(Calculation) - Method in class pl.lib.config.ColumnDefinition.Builder
Sets the type of calculations performed at the report level.
ReportConfig - Class in pl.lib.config
Main report configuration class.
ReportConfig() - Constructor for class pl.lib.config.ReportConfig
Default constructor for JSON deserialization.
ReportConfig.Builder - Class in pl.lib.config
Builder for ReportConfig class implementing Builder pattern.
ReportStyles - Class in pl.lib.model
Utility class containing predefined style names, colors, fonts and patterns for reports.
ReportTheme - Enum Class in pl.lib.config
Enum defining available visual themes for reports.
